job_details.Vacaturetitel: Staff Software Engineer, Backend - ML Platform
job_details.Functieomschrijving: We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our Michelangelo ML Platform team (ML background is not required).
job_details.full_text:
Staff Software Engineer, Backend - ML Platform

We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our Michelangelo ML Platform team (ML background is not required).

profile_classification.rationale: The job title suggests a backend software engineering role focused on an ML platform, but the description explicitly states 'ML background is not required'. It lacks specific details about AI/ML tasks, models, or generative techniques, making it difficult to classify into a specialized AI role. It appears to be a general backend software engineering position supporting an ML platform.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates a role focused on software development, specifically on the backend systems.

job_tasks.phrase: join our Michelangelo ML Platform team
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the engineer will be part of a team developing or maintaining an ML platform, which involves software development aspects.
